line_1: I'll play the card comes next my fingers —
line_2: No good comes on it when one lingers —

line_1: One breaks the glass and cuts his fingers,
line_2: With hopeless wish one looks and lingers,

line_1: And counts his feet upon his fingers;
line_2: About it and about it lingers,

line_1: But grasps a flame, and burns his fingers;
line_2: That he who after knowledge lingers
